simple_prompt: A medieval knight battling a cartoonish dragon in a bright forest. 2D Animation.
detailed_prompt: [0-4s] ACTION:{Knight swings sword at dragon; it dodges with flair.} CAMERA:{Epic battle POV.} SUBJECT:{Knight in shining armor. Dragon: fire-breathing, expressive eyes.} SCENE:{Bright green forest glade.} LIGHT:{High-key, colorful.} STYLE:{2D cel animation, bold outlines, squash-and-stretch physics.} FX:{Spark trails from sword, tiny embers.} AUDIO:{Clang! Roar!}

simple_prompt: A single astronaut floating peacefully outside the ISS. Realistic.
detailed_prompt:
# ORBITAL SOLITUDE - Cinematic spacewalk realism.  
Subject: Single astronaut in white EMU spacesuit, tethered to the ISS. Action: Slowly drifting away from the station. Scene: Earth's limb with deep black space, solar panels, stars. Lighting: Harsh direct sunlight on the suit, deep black shadows, blue-tinted reflection on the visor showing Earth below. Camera: Static medium shot, slow dolly-in at 0.5s, subtle lens flare catching the visor. Grade: High contrast, deep blacks, hyper-sharp focus, slight halation on the sun.

simple_prompt: A butterfly landing on a flower in a garden
detailed_prompt: # FIRST TOUCH - MACRO BOTANICAL DRAMA - Subject: Black swallowtail butterfly (large, iridescent wing pattern). Action: Slowly alighting on a yellow daisy. Scene: English country garden, late spring, soft sunlight. Lighting: Backlit by the sun, creating a halo around the butterfly and rim lighting on the wings. Camera: Extreme close-up macro, fixed tripod, focus on the delicate landing legs first, then the wing unfolding. Grade: High saturation on the orange/yellow colors, soft focus on the background, focus on the texture of the wing's scales and the pollen grains.

simple_prompt: A realistic underwater scene with bioluminescent jellyfish swimming in the dark
detailed_prompt: Cinematic underwater sequence in deep ocean trench where giant glowing jellyfish drift slowly through pitch blackness. Camera: slow push through water column capturing tentacles trailing behind. Lighting: primary illumination comes from internal blue/pink bioluminescence of jellies creating otherworldly glow. VFX: subtle floating particles and plankton swirl in currents. Palette: deep navy to electric blues/reds. Audio: muffled underwater ambience with distant whale calls.

simple_prompt: A panda bear sleeping peacefully in a bamboo forest.
detailed_prompt: # GENTLE GIANT - WILD ANIMAL DOCUMENTARY - Subject: Adult Giant Panda (black-and-white fur, relaxed expression). Action: Lying on a mossy log, breathing deeply, occasionally moving a paw. Scene: Dense misty bamboo forest, soft morning light. Lighting: Soft, diffused golden hour light filtering through the canopy, subtle rim light around the panda's black fur. Camera: Telephoto lens, fixed tripod, extreme close-up on the panda's face and chest, focus on the texture of the fur and the shallow breathing. Grade: High saturation on the black/white contrast, soft-focus background bokeh, calm teal/green palette.

simple_prompt: A chef skillfully flipping pancakes in a busy, modern kitchen.
detailed_prompt: # FLIP OF CHARM - [Scene: A chef tosses pancakes with perfect precision in a bustling commercial kitchen. Steam rises from the griddle.] - Camera: Dynamic gimbal shot tracking the flip. Cut to close-up of pancake landing perfectly. - Lighting: Bright overhead lights with warm stove glow. Smoke billows from pan. - Motion: Chef moves with practiced grace. Pancakes rotate smoothly. - Details: Flour dust on counter; spatula at ready. Timer ticks. - Atmosphere: Skill, rhythm, culinary artistry. - Style: Culinary mastery with kinetic energy. Inspired by Ratatouille and MasterChef. - Color Grading: Warm tones with high contrast and steam texture. Add depth. - Sound Design: Sizzle, flip, and countdown.

simple_prompt: A 2D animation of a small dragon learning how to fly
detailed_prompt: # First Flight — [0-4s] ACTION:{dragon attempts takeoff, wobbles}; CAMERA:{low-angle MS}; SUBJECT:{cute red dragon}; SCENE:{hilltop at sunrise}; LIGHT:{warm golden light}; STYLE:{2D cel, painterly sky}; FX:{tiny dust puff}; AUDIO:{soft wing flap}

simple_prompt: A hyper-realistic close-up of a honeybee pollinating a flower.
detailed_prompt: Subject: A European honeybee (high detail on the fuzzy thorax). Action: Landing carefully on a bright yellow daisy, pollen visible on its legs. Scene: A meadow at dawn, dew on the petals. Lighting: Soft, diffused golden-hour light, strong rim light on the wings and the pollen particles. Camera: Macro probe lens, extreme close-up, focus on the compound eyes and the hairy legs. Grade: High saturation on yellows and blacks, crisp detail, subtle bloom on the edges.

simple_prompt: A cyberpunk alleyway filled with neon signs and light rain
detailed_prompt: Neon-drenched alleyway at night during rainstorm. Atmosphere: steam rising from vents, reflections on wet pavement. Lighting: saturated magenta/cyan signage, volumetric fog effects. Raindrops: realistic physics with light refraction. Camera: slow dolly through alley, 360° rotation. Audio: rain sounds, electronic music, urban ambience.

simple_prompt: A chameleon slowly changing colors on a branch.
detailed_prompt: # CHROMATIC TRANSFORMATION - Macro documentary style, focus on a chameleon's skin cells (chromatophores) actively changing color. Action: Chameleon remains perfectly still as its entire body transitions from green to brown to blue, visible at cellular level. Background: Detailed naturalistic foliage, out of focus. Camera: Extreme close-up, fixed tripod, high-speed photography to capture color change smoothly. Lighting: Soft daylight, no shadows, emphasis on skin texture and color saturation. Color: Hyper-realistic chameleon colors with scientific accuracy. Audio: Quiet forest ambience and subtle breathing sounds.

simple_prompt: A stop-motion animation of a teddy bear having a tea party.
detailed_prompt: # TOY THEATRE - CLASSIC STOP-MOTION - Subject: A vintage-looking teddy bear and three small toy figures. Action: The teddy bear pours 'tea' from a tiny porcelain cup to the other toys, all perfectly synchronized with subtle, naturalistic motion. Scene: A miniature dollhouse table with checkered cloth, surrounded by green felt grass. Lighting: Soft, diffused daylight, strong highlight on the porcelain glaze, deep, soft shadows. Camera: Low-angle shot, fixed tripod, emphasis on the scale difference and the delicate movement. Grade: Warm, nostalgic color palette, slight film grain, soft focus.

simple_prompt: A 3D animated penguin sliding down an icy hill at sunset
detailed_prompt: [0-4s] ACTION:{Penguin slides, spins, crashes adorably}; CAMERA:{tracking shot}; SUBJECT:{chunky stylized penguin}; SCENE:{icy mountain ridge, pink-orange sunset backdrop}; LIGHT:{warm sunset rim lighting}; STYLE:{cel-shading, chunky textures}; FX:{snow puff on spin}; AUDIO:{slide + crunch}

simple_prompt: A slow-motion shot of a drop of red ink dissolving in a glass of water.
detailed_prompt: # CHROMATIC DISSIPATION ## Subject / Scene Settings - Audience: {locale="US"}; Narrative tone: abstract art, entropy - Subject type: macro experiment - Key features: ink cloud expansion; color diffusion; water transparency; droplet interaction; Scale: extreme macro focus; Motion: time-lapse/real-time water physics - Location: clear glass container; Time: continuous; Weather/Light: bright studio lighting - Key elements (FG/MG/BG): FG ink droplet detail / MG expanding red cloud / BG clear glass and water background - Lighting: backlighting through glass for clarity; side light for color saturation; internal refraction - Grade: Palette bright red ink against clear water; diffusion bokeh; maintained sharp detail in droplet; abstract color - Visual taste: abstract science/mechanical process; fluid dynamics visible; meditative dissolution - Camera: locked macro tripod; gimbal minimal sway; focus rack on droplet expansion - Lens/Focus: macro 100mm feel; extreme shallow DOF; droplet detail crisp - Coverage: droplet impact to full dissolution; diffusion rate; color dispersion complete

simple_prompt: A majestic whale breaching in the middle of a calm, blue ocean.
detailed_prompt: Marine spectacle - humpback whale performing perfect breach against clear, deep blue water. Action: slow rise from depths, powerful vertical thrust, full body rotation, violent crash-landing creating massive splash. Camera: low-angle tracking shot matching whale's speed; wide-angle for scale. Lighting: bright tropical sunlight creating caustics under water. Color: vibrant blues with white foam. Audio: thunderous impact, water roar, and awe-inspired music.

simple_prompt: A knight in shining armor riding a horse through a fantasy kingdom.
detailed_prompt: Heroic cinematic ride-through of a thriving medieval fantasy realm. A noble armored knight on a powerful steed gallops along a broad cobblestone road, passing villages, castles, and forests. Camera: Dynamic side-tracking shots matching horse speed, with occasional slow-motion captures of banner flapping in wind. Lighting: Late afternoon sun creates golden highlights on armor and hair, long shadows stretch across fields. Palette: Warm earth tones with vibrant heraldry colors. Audio: Hoofbeat rhythm, distant village chatter, and epic orchestral swells.

simple_prompt: A close-up of a steaming cup of coffee next to a rain-streaked window.
detailed_prompt: # MORNING THAW - COFFEE CINEMATOGRAPHY - Subject: A matte black ceramic mug with dark, rich espresso. Action: Slow, shallow depth-of-field shot (f/1.8) focusing on the smooth, dark surface of the coffee, with tiny steam wisps rising and curling upwards. Scene: Cool-toned room, morning light through a rain-streaked window. Lighting: Soft, directional side light creating subtle catchlights in the coffee's surface and strong contrast between warm coffee and cool environment. Camera: Extreme macro probe lens, fixed tripod, focus on the texture of the crema, slow 10-second pull-focus from the coffee to the glass window. Grade: Moody, high-contrast, deep black shadows, hyper-sharp detail on the coffee texture, slight vignette.

simple_prompt: A 3D animated Tyrannosaurus Rex trying to ride a bicycle.
detailed_prompt:
[Scene: A T-Rex attempts to ride a bicycle through a suburban neighborhood. It wobbles comically but eventually pedals forward.]  
Camera: Tracking shot from behind. Cut to side view showing determination.  
Lighting: Bright daylight with shadow. Reflective chrome on bike.  
Motion: Unsteady pedaling with exaggerated effort. Tail sways.  
Details: Bike has training wheels; T-Rex wears helmet.  
Style: Zany 3D animation with physical comedy. Inspired by The Flintstones.  
Sound: Bicycle bell, panting, and crunching leaves.

simple_prompt: A ninja sneaking across rooftops under a full moon
detailed_prompt: Action packed night sequence on Japanese feudal era rooftops. A lone black clad ninja moves with fluid silent agility between tiled peaks while below the village sleeps under a glowing full moon. Dramatic lighting: bright moon rim light outlines figures against deep shadows, occasional subtle torch flickers in the distance. Camera alternates between low angles tracking the ninja and high angle reveals showing him silhouetted against the moon. Tight framing on hands gripping edges, cloths fluttering, and tense close ups of eyes. Sound design emphasizes quiet tension - distant temple bells, subtle breathing, and sudden sharp movements.

simple_prompt: An oil painting style landscape of a medieval village.
detailed_prompt: Style: Hyperrealistic oil painting simulation with cinematic lighting. A medieval village nestled in a valley at sunset. Lighting: Warm golden hour light with long shadows and volumetric dust. Atmosphere: Mist rising from the river, birds flying home. Details: Cobblestone streets, wooden houses with thatched roofs, smoke from chimneys. Camera: Slow dolly through the village, then pull back to reveal the surrounding mountains. Grade: Rich earthy tones with deep reds and golds.

simple_prompt: Steampunk airship battle in the clouds with brass gears and steam engines
detailed_prompt: 19th-century sci-fi clash above an endless sea of mist. Two ornate airships: one British, one French, maneuver through cloud banks. Each ship is a floating fortress of brass, copper and wood, spewing steam from massive engines. Cannons erupt with explosions that send shrapnel through the clouds, while smaller flying machines dogfight below. Lighting: soft god rays piercing through low-lying clouds, casting dramatic shadows on the ships' hulls. Camera: dynamic aerial shots mixing wide panoramas with close-ups of intricate machinery and intense combat. Color: muted earth tones with bright brass accents and billowing white smoke. Audio: deep engine rumbles, cannon fire, metallic clangs, and distant battle cries.

simple_prompt: Cyberpunk city at night with neon signs reflecting on wet streets, flying cars overhead
detailed_prompt: Neon-drenched cyberpunk street scene, rain-slicked pavement. Dynamic lighting: magenta/cyan neon signs, car headlights streaking. Flying vehicles glide above, casting moving shadows. Animated details: holographic ads flicker, steam rises from vents. Camera: low-angle tracking shot, slow-motion at 2.1s. Grade: high-contrast, heavy halation, subtle chromatic aberration.

simple_prompt: Time-lapse of a bustling Tokyo street from dawn to midnight, realistic style
detailed_prompt: Cinematic time-lapse, 24fps look. A wide-angle shot from an elevated viewpoint overlooking Shibuya intersection. The scene: Dawn breaks, traffic lights change, pedestrians flood the crosswalks, then gradually thin as night falls and neon signs flick on. Key details: Pedestrian density patterns, changing light conditions (sunrise/sunset/night), vehicle flow. Camera remains static with a slight zoom-out during the day/night transition. Color grading: High dynamic range, vibrant but natural colors, smooth transitions between light states.

simple_prompt: A professional chef preparing sushi with precise knife techniques, close-up shots
detailed_prompt: # KITCHEN ARTISTRY - SUSHI PREPARATION - Subject: Master sushi chef (serious, focused expression). Action: Rapid, precise slicing of raw fish (sashimi) using a very sharp, traditional knife (hocho), followed by delicate placement on a wooden board. Scene: High-end Japanese restaurant kitchen, clean white surfaces, mid-day. Lighting: Bright, hard overhead light emphasizing the shine on the knife blade and the freshness of the fish. Camera: Extreme close-up on the hands and the board, macro lens, slow-motion on the cutting action, fixed tripod, focus on the texture of the fish and the precision of the cuts. Grade: Clean, high-contrast, cool-toned, emphasis on the red/pink of the salmon and the white of the rice.

simple_prompt: A clock ticking loudly in an empty room
detailed_prompt: # MELTDOWN PREPARATION - [Scene: A bomb defusal team enters a dark room. A single red light blinks on a timer.] - Camera: Extreme close-up on digital display. Cut to wide shot showing entire room. - Lighting: Emergency red glow. Clock face shines brightly. - Motion: Hands move swiftly. Timer counts down. - Details: Tools, wires, sweat on brow. - Atmosphere: Urgency, tension, precision. - Style: Thriller realism. Inspired by Mission: Impossible and The Bourne Identity. - Color Grading: Red and black palette. Add motion blur and heat haze. - Sound Design: Clock ticks, breathing, and countdown.

simple_prompt: A cat chasing a laser pointer across a living room
detailed_prompt: # DOMINION OF LIGHT - FELINE HUNTING INSTINCT - Subject: Domestic tabby cat (sharp focus). Action: Leaping pounce towards a red laser dot moving rapidly over a rug. Scene: Warm, cozy living room, mid-afternoon light. Lighting: Soft window light from the side, strong rim light on the cat's fur, intense red glow of the laser dot. Camera: Low-angle tracking shot, smooth slow-motion on the pounce, fixed tripod, wide-angle to capture the room. Grade: Warm, soft-focus, high contrast on the red laser dot, subtle film grain.

simple_prompt: A serene river flowing through a lush, misty bamboo forest.
detailed_prompt: Jade serenity: A crystalline river winds through a dense bamboo grove shrouded in soft mist. Camera: Slow dolly along the water's edge, 24mm wide lens. Lighting: Diffused morning sun filtering through canopy, creating gentle god rays. Palette: Deep greens, silver water, cool blue shadows. Audio: Soft water flow + distant birdsong.

simple_prompt: A dragon flying over mountains during sunset
detailed_prompt: # LEGENDARY FLIGHT - Cinematic fantasy sequence of an ancient red-scaled dragon soaring through dramatic alpine valleys at sunset. The dragon's massive body silhouetted against brilliant orange and pink skies, wing membranes catching light and casting moving shadows on snow-capped peaks below. Camera alternates between wide establishing shots showing scale and intimate tracking shots following the beast through passes. Volumetric dust clouds and mist in valleys, with distant villages providing tiny human-scale perspective. Color grading: Deep rich oranges and crimsons with high contrast, subtle lens flares from the sun.

simple_prompt: Anime style magical girl transformation sequence with sparkles and ribbons

simple_prompt: A pixel art character, a tiny wizard, running across a giant bookshelf.
detailed_prompt: # LIBRARY ADVENTURE - BOOKWORM RUN - [Scene: A miniature wizard races across towering shelves in an ancient library. Books topple but catch themselves.] - Camera: Tracking shot at eye-level of books. Cut to overhead view showing maze-like shelves. - Lighting: Dust motes float in sunbeams through stained glass. Warm glow from oil lamps. - Motion: Wizard sprints with staff. Books swing open and close automatically. - Details: Spellbook pages flip rapidly; quills write notes. - Atmosphere: Adventure, knowledge, speed. - Style: Fantasy pixel art with magical whimsy. Inspired by The Last Story and Dragon Quest. - Color Grading: Rich reds, golds, and browns with glowing accents. Add lens flare and film grain. - Sound Design: Pages turning, footsteps on wood, and magical whoosh.

simple_prompt: A vintage car driving down a deserted desert highway at dusk.
detailed_prompt: Classic 1960s film noir/crime drama style (e.g., *Blade Runner* 2049 aesthetic). A 1960s American muscle car (e.g., Ford Mustang) drives alone on a straight, endless highway through an expansive, barren desert landscape. The time is twilight, with long, low sun rays creating dramatic, cinematic lighting across the vehicle's chrome surfaces and the dusty ground. Dust trails follow behind the car. Camera: Static wide shot from a distant hilltop, capturing the entire scene in one frame, emphasizing the isolation and the vastness of the environment. Lighting: Harsh, directional sun light with deep shadows and long, dramatic reflections on the car's bodywork. Color Grade: High-contrast, desaturated palette with warm golden highlights from the sunset and cool blue shadows.

simple_prompt: A steampunk airship flying through clouds of clockwork gears.
detailed_prompt:
[Scene: An ornate Victorian airship with brass fittings and wooden hull sails through a sky filled with mechanical clouds made of clockwork gears. Cannons point outward.]  
Camera: Aerial tracking shot alongside the ship. Cut to interior view of captain steering.  
Lighting: Soft golden hour light with steam puffs glowing. Clouds reflect sunset colors.  
Mood: Adventurous, industrial fantasy.  
Style: Detailed steampunk design with functional machinery visible. Inspired by Klockwork and Fullmetal Alchemist.  
Details: Pigeon-like birds fly near the ship; a spyglass rests on the desk. Clockwork mechanisms hum and tick.  
Audio: Steam whistle, creaking wood, and clanking gears.

simple_prompt: A view from a car window driving through a neon-lit city at night.
detailed_prompt: Cinematic drive-through of Tokyo/West Coast neon city. Camera: Fixed dash-cam perspective looking out front. Lighting: High-contrast neon reflections on wet road, volumetric fog. Motion: Smooth 30fps with parallax from passing signs/buildings. Palette: Electric blues, magentas, deep blacks. Audio: Car radio pop music + engine hum.

simple_prompt: Time-lapse of a massive city skyline at sunset with car lights streaking.
detailed_prompt: SKYLINE SUNSET - Urban time-lapse from an elevated viewpoint overlooking a sprawling city. The scene transitions from golden afternoon to deep twilight. Thousands of car lights create brilliant horizontal streaks across multiple bridges and highways. Individual buildings transform through color changes: warm sunset tones shift to cool night illumination. Foreground elements include moving clouds and occasional airplane trails. Audio: compressed version of city sounds, subtle traffic rhythms, and evolving ambient score matching light progression.

simple_prompt: A rocket launching into the sky with smoke trailing behind
detailed_prompt: # ASTRODYNAMIC ASCENT - [Scene: A SpaceX Falcon Heavy lifts off from Cape Canaveral. Flames roar as it climbs, leaving a trail of white smoke.] - Camera: Wide shot from launch pad. Cut to tracking shot as rocket ascends. - Lighting: Bright orange exhaust contrasts with blue sky. Sunlight glints on metal surfaces. - Motion: Rocket accelerates, shaking the ground. Smoke trails form intricate patterns. - Details: Launch tower retracts; boosters separate. Starlink satellites deploy. - Atmosphere: Power, engineering marvel, ambition. - Style: Technological spectacle. Inspired by Interstellar and The Martian. - Color Grading: High-contrast, fiery orange and electric blue. Add motion blur. - Sound Design: Thunderous engine roar, countdown, and applause.

simple_prompt: A dramatic trailer for a movie about a talking squirrel who is a secret agent.
detailed_prompt: # ACROBAT OF THE NUTS - [0-4s] ACTION:{Squirrel dodges laser beam; rolls on roof}. CAMERA:{Low-angle tracking}. SUBJECT:{Tiny squirrel in suit}. SCENE:{Skyscrapers}. LIGHT:{Strobe from device}. STYLE:{Spy film + humor}. FX:{Laser trail}. AUDIO:{High-tech beeps}

simple_prompt: A spaceship landing on an alien planet with purple skies
detailed_prompt: First person view from inside the cockpit of a futuristic scout ship as it descends through swirling purple clouds toward an alien landscape. Outside the viewport: massive crystalline formations, bioluminescent flora, strange floating rocks. Inside: glowing holographic interface displaying navigation data. Camera tilts down as thrusters kick up dust revealing giant footpads extending. Volumetric purple haze with lens flares and subtle heat distortion effects. Rich deep space sound design with sub-bass engine rumbles and electronic beeps. Cool blue and magenta color grading with high contrast and digital halation.

simple_prompt: A cute anime-style girl reading a book under a cherry blossom tree
detailed_prompt: # SPRING DAYDREAM - WHIMSICAL STUDY ANIME SEQUENCE - Subject: Young girl (14-year-old, expressive face) sitting cross-legged on a soft mat. Action: Turning the pages of a large illustrated book slowly, a gentle smile, petals falling onto her hair. Scene: Late spring, Japanese garden, dense pink cherry blossoms (full bloom), shallow focus on the book. Lighting: Soft, diffused overcast light, subtle rim light on the girl's hair, warm-toned reflected light from the ground. Camera: Low-angle medium shot, fixed tripod, focus on the girl's face and hands, very shallow depth of field, subtle lens bloom on the bright petals. Grade: Pastel color palette (pinks, whites, soft greens), slight vignette, soft film grain, dreamy atmosphere.

simple_prompt: A baby's first steps, captured from the parent's perspective, realistic home video style
detailed_prompt: # FIRST STEPS - FAMILY MOMENT - Subject: A toddler (18-24 months old, wobbly, determined). Action: The child takes its first independent steps across a hardwood floor in a living room, looking back at the camera. Scene: Warm, natural lighting, soft carpeted area, family photos on the wall. Camera: Handheld, low angle, slightly shaky, telephoto lens compression, wide aperture, focusing on the child's face and the tentative steps. Grade: Warm, soft focus, film grain, high contrast on skin tones, subtle lens distortion.

simple_prompt: Underwater scene of bioluminescent jellyfish drifting through a dark ocean, realistic
detailed_prompt: Cinematic underwater shot following giant bioluminescent jellyfish moving slowly through dark depths. Tentacles pulse with cyan and purple light, casting subtle ripples on surrounding water. Camera drifts alongside with gentle roll, capturing translucent bodies with volumetric glow and refractive details. Sound design: deep ocean ambience with low rumbles and distant whale calls. Lighting: zero external light, pure creature self-illumination with minimal blue edge light for realism.

simple_prompt: 2D animation of a paper boat sailing through a storm in a puddle
detailed_prompt: # PAPER VESSEL — STORMY JOURNEY ## Subject / Scene Settings - Narrative tone: emotional journey, resilience - Subject type: expressive 2D animation - Key features: paper boat; raindrops; puddle waves; storm clouds; Scale: intimate scale; Motion: sailing through water; rain interaction; cloud movement - Location: rainy city gutter; Time: afternoon storm; Weather/Light: overcast with rain shafts; puddle reflections - Key elements (FG/MG/BG): FG rain detail / MG boat journey / BG storm clouds and city outline - Lighting: diffused storm light; raindrop refraction effects; puddle reflection patterns - Grade: Cool blue/gray palette; enhanced rain bokeh; maintained detail in overcast conditions; film grain - Visual taste: hand-drawn emotional animation; rain physics visible; emotional weight in simple elements - Camera: tracking shots alongside boat; close-ups of rain interaction; wide shots showing environment - Lens/Focus: 50mm feel; raindrop bokeh; water surface detail crisp

simple_prompt: A 3D astronaut exploring an alien desert with purple sand dunes

simple_prompt: A pixel art spaceship navigating an asteroid field.

Lighting: Engine glow illuminates the ship and dust trails. Asteroid surfaces show geological variety. Camera: Dynamic flight tracking shots with quick cuts to bridge views. simple_prompt: A realistic shot of a wolf standing on a mountain peak at sunrise.
detailed_prompt: Subject: A large, golden-furred wolf. Action: Standing still, looking out over a vast valley below. Scene: Very high mountain ridge, deep snow, clear, cold sunrise. Lighting: Strong, low sun backlighting the fur, long shadows, frost on the ground. Camera: Fixed tripod, extreme telephoto feel, wide-angle view of the landscape behind, emphasis on the animal's size and isolation. simple_prompt: A paper airplane flying through a sunny classroom.

Cut to side view showing trajectory. - Lighting: Bright daylight streams through windows. simple_prompt: A claymation-style character watering giant talking plants
detailed_prompt: # GARDEN OF VOICES - STOP-MOTION FABLE - Subject: Anthropomorphic clay figures (detailed, squash-and-stretch animation). Action: A tiny gardener carefully waters oversized talking flowers. Scene: Enchanted garden with bioluminescent plants, glowing magical dust. Lighting: Soft, diffused twilight glow from the plants, warm practical lighting from the watering can. Camera: Low-angle shot, slow push-in, subtle camera shake (simulated handheld feel), emphasis on lip-sync for the plant dialogue. simple_prompt: A pack of wolves running through a snowy forest under the northern lights
detailed_prompt: # ARCTIC PREDATORS - CANIS MOLYNNX FURY - Subject: Four arctic gray wolves (thick fur, sharp eyes). Action: Sprinting at full speed across a frozen riverbed, kicking up small snow clouds. Scene: Deep Arctic forest, complete darkness, background lit by intense aurora borealis (green/pink curtain). Lighting: Primary light is the dancing green/pink aurora, strong rim light on the wolves' silhouettes, subtle fill from the moon. Camera: Low-angle tracking shot (drone/hovering helicopter feel), slow-motion on the snow kick-up and eye detail, wide-angle to capture the scale. Grade: High-contrast, cold blue/green palette, extreme clarity in the snow texture, subtle lens-flare from the aurora.

simple_prompt: A penguin sliding on its belly across ice
detailed_prompt: # GLACIAL SLIDE - [Scene: A penguin slides down a snowy hillside on its belly, leaving a trail of friction marks.] - Camera: Low-angle tracking shot following slide. Cut to wide view showing scale. - Lighting: Bright sunlight reflects off ice. Shadows are sharp. - Motion: Penguin waddles forward, then glides smoothly. Arms extend for balance. - Details: Ice crystals sparkle; snow flies. Wind whistles. - Atmosphere: Playfulness, simplicity, natural physics. - Style: Whimsical wildlife with comic timing. Inspired by March of the Penguins and Madagascar. - Color Grading: Cool blues and whites with high contrast. Add motion blur. - Sound Design: Squeaky feet, wind rush, and playful chirps.

simple_prompt: A bouncy castle floating in outer space with colorful alien children playing.
detailed_prompt: # COSMIC PLAYGROUND - SCI-FI FANTASY - Subject: Three brightly-colored cartoon-style aliens (blue, green, yellow) bouncing on an inflatable castle. Action: The castle inflates and deflates rhythmically in zero-G, aliens giggling and spinning. Scene: Deep space, background is a starfield, Earth in the distance. Lighting: Single strong key light source (sun), deep black shadows, bounce light from the castle walls. Camera: Locked medium shot, wide-angle, slow-motion, focus on the weightlessness and joy. Grade: High-saturation, clean, vibrant colors, soft focus, dreamlike.

simple_prompt: A pixel-art scene of a medieval town square bustling with characters
detailed_prompt: # VILLAGE HEART - MEDIEVAL PIXEL ART - Subject: Diverse medieval villagers (peasant, merchant, knight). Action: Busy market activity (selling goods, chatting). Scene: Cobblestone town square with fountain, sundial. Lighting: Warm midday sun, deep shadows. Camera: Fixed medium shot from a window ledge, capturing the hustle and bustle. Grade: High-saturation earthy tones (reds, browns), clean pixel art lines, slight motion blur on moving figures.

simple_prompt: A flock of paper airplanes taking off from a desk and flying into the sky.
detailed_prompt: # PAPER FLIGHT - Desk departure sequence and journey to sky. [Scene: Multiple origami airplanes launched from a cluttered desk. They soar upward through open window into bright blue sky.] - Camera: Overhead shot revealing launch angles, followed by tracking flight path. - Lighting: Bright daylight with reflections on glass surfaces. - Motion: Aerodynamic glides with gentle turns. Some stall and spiral. - Details: Paper texture; ink marks; string tied for control. - Atmosphere: Creativity, freedom, imagination. - Style: Whimsical animation with physical accuracy. Inspired by The Iron Giant and Paperman. - Color Grading: Clean whites and blues with warm desk contrast. Add depth of field. - Sound Design: Gentle whooshes, wind, and uplifting chimes.

simple_prompt: A photorealistic lion walking through tall grass at golden hour
detailed_prompt: Subject: Mature male lion (golden coat, mane). Action: Slow, stalking walk through long savanna grass. Scene: African savanna at golden hour, dust motes visible. Lighting: Strong, low sun creating long shadows and rim light on the fur. Camera: Medium close-up, slow dolly-in, wide-angle to capture the landscape, focus on the texture of the fur and the eyes. Grade: Warm, high-saturation orange/amber tones, deep shadows, fine grain.

simple_prompt: Macro photography style video of a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly
detailed_prompt: # METAMORPHIC TRANSITION - BIOMICAL PROCESS ## Subject / Scene Settings - Audience: {locale="DE"}; Narrative tone: miraculous, biological wonder - Subject type: macro nature/biological process - Key features: chrysalis transformation; wing unfolding detail; emergence sequence; structural change; Scale: extreme macro biological process scale; Motion: time-lapse metamorphosis progression - Location: natural habitat; Time: life cycle timing; Weather/Light: natural process lighting - Key elements (FG/MG/BG): FG transformation details / MG chrysalis structure / BG blurring during change - Lighting: Natural process illumination; wing emergence highlighting; structural change visibility - Grade: Palette metamorphosis colors; wing pattern development; transformation clarity; biological process tones - Visual taste: BBC Life/Nature documentary quality; miraculous biological process; transformation visible - Camera: Locked macro position; gimbal minimal movement for time-lapse effect; focus on transformation - Lens/Focus: Macro 100mm feel; extreme depth of field for transformation detail; wing emergence crisp - Coverage: Transformation sequence; wing unfolding detail; emergence moment; post-emergence transition

simple_prompt: A stop-motion animation of clay figures building a sandcastle on a beach.
detailed_prompt: # BEACH CONSTRUCTION - CLAYMATION WHIMSICALITY - Subject: Highly detailed, exaggerated, anthropomorphic clay characters (chunky, expressive features). Action: Collaborating to build an elaborate sandcastle complete with towers and moat. Scene: Bright, overcast beach day, wet sand, seagulls flying overhead. Lighting: Soft, diffused daylight, slight rim light from the sea spray catching the sun. Camera: Fixed tripod, medium close-up, high-speed playback (simulated real-time) to emphasize the physicality of the clay, subtle camera shake for organic feel. Grade: Saturated, clean whites and blues, soft focus, slightly grainy texture.

simple_prompt: A jellyfish pulsating with bioluminescent light in the deep sea.
detailed_prompt: MAGICAL DEEP-OCEAN MACRO - [Scene: A giant jellyfish pulses slowly in pitch-black water. Its translucent body glows with internal blue light.] - Camera: Slow, smooth tracking shot through the water. Use 100mm macro lens for eerie intimacy. - Lighting: Bioluminescent glow emanates from tentacles and bell. No external light source. - Motion: Pulsing rhythm is hypnotic. Tentacles trail behind like ribbons. - Details: Microscopic particles float in the gelatinous mass. - Atmosphere: Alien beauty, otherworldly serenity. - Style: Deep-sea horror-meets-ethereal documentary. Inspired by The Abyss and Ghost in the Shell. - Color Grading: Deep indigo to electric blue. Add subtle haze and volumetric light. - Sound Design: Muffled underwater sounds, low-frequency hum, and ethereal chimes.

simple_prompt: A dragon soaring through cotton candy clouds at sunset, 2D animation style
detailed_prompt: [0-3s] ACTION:{Dragon flies gracefully; clouds roll past}; CAMERA:{wide tracking shot}; SUBJECT:{flame-colored dragon}; SCENE:{pastel sky sunset}; LIGHT:{warm orange gradient}; STYLE:{storybook cel}; FX:{spark trails}; AUDIO:{wind rush}

simple_prompt: A cozy coffee shop in the rain, view through the window with raindrops sliding down the glass
detailed_prompt: Cozy café interior shot from outside perspective looking through window pane. Rain droplets slide down glass in visible streaks, reflecting bokeh of street lights and neon signs outside. Inside: barista grinding beans, steaming milk, latte art on counter; soft warm lighting contrasts cool blue tones outside. Audio: espresso machine hiss, rain patter, jazz music.

simple_prompt: A cozy kitchen scene where a robot chef prepares pancakes
detailed_prompt: # ROBOTIC COZY — KITCHEN PREPARATION ## Subject / Scene Settings - Narrative tone: futuristic domestic warmth, precise automation - Subject type: robotic domestic activity - Key features: robot arm; cooking equipment; pancake batter; kitchen environment; Scale: kitchen worktop level; Motion: precise robotic movements; pancake flipping; ingredient preparation - Location: modern kitchen; Time: morning; Weather/Light: warm kitchen lighting; practical appliance lights; breakfast atmosphere - Key elements (FG/MG/BG): FG robot arm details / MG cooking surface with ingredients / BG kitchen environment - Lighting: Warm practical lighting; backlight on rising steam; shadow from robot arm creating pattern - Grade: Enhanced warm colors; maintained detail in metallic surfaces; food appetizing enhancement; kitchen ambience - Visual taste: Pixar-style robotics with heart; precise motion capture feel - Camera: Over-the-shoulder view of cooking process; follow-shot of robot arm movements

simple_prompt: A dramatic storm forming over an open ocean with lightning strikes
detailed_prompt: # OCEANIC ANGER - ATMOSPHERIC DRAMA - Subject: Massive, dark cumulonimbus cloud system (super cell) with pronounced anvil top. Action: Rapidly growing, chaotic cloud structure; frequent, powerful lightning flashes (cloud-to-cloud and cloud-to-ground) illuminating the entire scene. Scene: Mid-ocean, wide-angle shot, deep twilight/night, water surface. Lighting: Primary light is the intense, rapid, blue-white lightning illumination (strobe effect), followed by very deep night. Camera: Fixed tripod, ultra-wide-angle lens, extremely high-speed slow-motion on the lightning strikes to capture the full flash and aftermath. Grade: High-contrast, monochromatic (greyscale with lightning color), emphasis on the scale and violence of the storm.

simple_prompt: An anime-style samurai standing in a torrential downpour.
detailed_prompt: Miyazaki/Panasonic aesthetic, hyper-detailed. A ronin (veteran, scarred face) stands perfectly still in a bamboo forest during a massive, sustained thunderstorm. Camera: Extreme telephoto lens effect on the water spray (misting), capturing individual raindrops hitting his skin with perfect clarity. Lighting: Overcast, diffused light, but the intensity of the downpour creates a dramatic, moody atmosphere. VFX: Subtle steam rising from his body where the rain hits hot skin. Audio: Heavy rain ASMR, distant thunder, and a minimalist, melancholic shamisen.

simple_prompt: A robot walking through a futuristic city at night
detailed_prompt: Cinematic wide tracking shot following humanoid robot with glowing eyes along neon lit avenue. Dynamic reflections on polished chrome body, layered traffic trails. Wet street surface, subtle steam vents. Lighting: high contrast neon magenta/cyan, volumetric fog at street level. Audio: synth beats, distant car hum, metallic footsteps.

simple_prompt: A macro shot of ink swirling in water in slow motion
detailed_prompt: # INK CHOREOGRAPHY - FLUID DYNAMICS MACRO ## Subject / Scene Settings - Audience: {locale="US"}; Narrative tone: abstract art, scientific beauty - Subject type: abstract/liquid - Key features: ink plume diffusion; color swirls; fluid flow patterns; water transparency; Scale: extreme macro liquid scale; Motion: slow diffusion and pattern formation through water - Location: clear water medium; Time: continuous; Weather/Light: studio lighting on transparent medium - Key elements (FG/MG/BG): FG ink details / MG diffusion zone / BG water clarity - Lighting: backlighting for transparency; side light for color separation; volumetric diffusion - Grade: Palette ink colors saturated; water transparency; diffusion bokeh; fine grain - Visual taste: abstract art film; fluid physics visible; meditative swirling - Camera: locked macro; gimbal minimal sway; focus rack through diffusion layers - Lens/Focus: macro 100mm feel; extreme DOF; diffusion bokeh prominent - Coverage: extended diffusion sequence; pattern evolution; maintain color detail

simple_prompt: A black and white film of a couple dancing in a grand ballroom.
detailed_prompt: 1940s Hollywood glamour aesthetic. A man and woman execute a sophisticated tango in a marble floored ballroom. Long, smooth tracking shots follow their feet, with the camera occasionally cutting to close ups of hands and facial expressions. Lighting: Warm, low key practical lighting from candelabras, creating deep shadows and sharp highlights on the dancers' faces. Grade: Classic black and white film grain, subtle vignetting, and a soft diffusion filter.

simple_prompt: A rusty old robot watering a small potted plant on a futuristic balcony.
detailed_prompt: # REPAIR AND HOPE - FUTURISTIC NOSTALGIA - Subject: A humanoid robot (massive, 1950s design, visible rust/corrosion). Action: Slowly lowering a small watering can over a tiny potted succulent on a balcony. Scene: Post-apocalyptic cityscape view through glass doors, sunset. Lighting: Warm golden hour light inside, deep blue outside, strong reflection of the sun on the robot's metal joints. Camera: Medium close-up, slow dolly-in, emphasis on the contrast between the delicate plant and the massive, broken machine. Grade: Desaturated, warm tones, heavy film grain, focus on texture.

simple_prompt: A train speeding through a snowy mountain pass
detailed_prompt: High-speed rail gliding along steel track through frozen Alps. Camera: onboard POV looking forward, snow whipping past windows. Lighting: cold blue ambient, warm interior glow. Motion: smooth speed lines on snowbanks. Audio: rail whistle, engine hum, wind rush.

simple_prompt: A golden retriever playing in a park, chasing butterflies on a sunny afternoon
detailed_prompt: # SUNSHINE AND PLEASURE - [Scene: A golden retriever runs through a sunlit park, bounding after fluttering butterflies. Grass sways in gentle breeze.] - Camera: Tracking shot at ground level, capturing playful motion and joyful expression. Cut to wide view showing expanse of green. - Lighting: Bright sunlight with long shadows. Golden hour glow enhances fur texture. - Motion: Dog leaps gracefully, tail wagging wildly. Butterflies dance around nose. - Details: Ribbon on collar; muddy paws. Birds chirp in trees. - Atmosphere: Innocence, freedom, pure happiness. - Style: Whimsical nature documentary. Inspired by Up and Finding Nemo. - Color Grading: Warm tones with high saturation. Add soft focus and subtle vignette. - Sound Design: Puppy barks, laughter, and rustling leaves.

simple_prompt: A realistic timelapse of clouds rolling over snowy mountains at sunrise
detailed_prompt: Dramatic landscape timelapse from a fixed tripod overlooking vast snow-covered peaks. Clouds roll rapidly across the sky in real-time while colors shift from deep blues to fiery oranges and pinks at dawn. Reflections shimmer on still water in foreground valleys. High dynamic range image, crisp detail in snow textures, and subtle lens breathing effects for realism. Slight camera shake and organic focus changes mimic a locked tripod in nature. Sound design: distant echoing birds, wind gusts, and subtle ambient drones.

simple_prompt: A skateboarder performing a trick in an urban plaza
detailed_prompt: [Scene: A skateboarder grinds a concrete ledge in a downtown plaza. Camera: Low-angle tracking shot, slow-motion on landing. Lighting: Late afternoon sun, long shadows. Motion: Skater pops off ledge with precision. Details: City skyline in background, graffiti walls. Atmosphere: Risk, skill, freedom. Style: Street sports energy. Color Grading: Saturated oranges and blues. Audio: Skateboard scrape, crowd cheers.]

simple_prompt: A cat wearing sunglasses skateboarding down a boardwalk.
detailed_prompt: [Scene: A sleek black cat with aviator sunglasses cruises on a skateboard along a sunny beach boardwalk. Waves crash in the background.] - Camera: Tracking shot matching speed. Cut to slow-motion aerial view. - Lighting: Bright sunlight reflecting off chrome wheels. Golden hour glow. - Motion: Smooth board slide with tail flicking. - Details: Beach towels, ice cream vendors. - Atmosphere: Cool confidence, urban feline style. - Style: Pop culture mashup. Inspired by The Royal Tenenbaums and Napoleon Dynamite. - Color Grading: Vibrant warm tones with high contrast. Add lens flare. - Sound Design: Skateboard roll, wave crash, and cool jazz track.

simple_prompt: A hot air balloon rising above a valley at dawn
detailed_prompt: # DAWN ASCENSION - AERIAL BEAUTY - Subject: Single, large, vibrant red/orange hot air balloon (detailed fabric texture). Action: Slowly rising straight up from a valley floor, passing through multiple layers of mist and cloud. Scene: Rolling green hills, deep valley, perfect golden hour light. Lighting: Strong, low sun creating long shadows behind the balloon, warm atmospheric haze. Camera: Fixed medium wide shot from a drone, slow parallax on the background layers (hill/mist/cloud), focus on the scale and the smooth ascent. Grade: Warm, high saturation, soft focus, dreamy atmosphere.

simple_prompt: A neon-lit Tokyo street at night, with rain reflecting off the pavement.
detailed_prompt: Neon-drenched streets of Shibuya at night during a rainstorm. The scene: crowded pedestrian crossing, billboards flashing, umbrellas in motion. Lighting: highly saturated magenta and cyan signage reflecting on wet asphalt. Camera: slow dolly through the crowd, then upward tilt to capture the density of lights. Audio: raindrops, traffic hum, and electronic music from shops.

simple_prompt: A wizard casting a spell in a dark forest
detailed_prompt: # MAGICAL UNVEILING - Cinematic fantasy sequence. A powerful wizard stands in a dense, ancient forest at midnight. Atmosphere: Thick mist with glowing bioluminescent fungi. Action: Wizard raises his staff, chanting in an ancient language. A swirling vortex of light and energy erupts from the staff, illuminating the scene with a brilliant white/blue glow. Camera: Dynamic low-angle shot, slow-motion on the light explosion. Lighting: Primary light source is the magical vortex, creating dramatic shadows and intense highlights. Color: Dark greens/browns with bright white/blue magical light accents. Audio: Powerful magical resonance, wind, and ancient choral music.

simple_prompt: Pixel art adventure of a knight battling a slime monster in a dungeon
detailed_prompt: Style: 16-bit RPG pixel art with smooth animation and vibrant colors. A brave knight in shining armor confronts a green slime monster on a cobblestone dungeon floor. The knight swings his sword with fluid motion, cutting through the ooze which reforms but grows increasingly angry. Lighting: torchlight flickers from walls casting dramatic shadows. Animation: slime squirms and retracts from attacks while knight's shield blocks impact. Camera: dynamic fight choreography with close-ups on blade impacts and slime texture details. Sound: clanging steel, slimy oozing, and battle cries.

simple_prompt: A watercolor painting of a sailboat on a stormy sea coming to life.
detailed_prompt: # WATERCOLOR REVIVAL - TITAN ACADEMIC ARTBOOK STYLE - Subject: A detailed, realistic 18th-century clipper ship (wooden hull) with tattered sails. Action: The paint on the watercolor painting begins to 'come alive' and animate. Scene: A painter's easel in a dimly lit studio. Lighting: Single warm-toned lamp creating long, dramatic shadows, subtle reflection on wet paint. Camera: Slow push-in from wide shot to extreme close-up on the paint texture, then a magical 'reveal' as the scene shifts to full 3D animation. Grade: High saturation, soft-focus watercolor look, dreamlike quality, deep shadows.

simple_prompt: A cup of coffee steaming on a wooden table
detailed_prompt: # MORNING RITUAL ## Subject / Scene Settings - Audience: {locale="US"}; Narrative tone: contemplative, ritualistic - Subject type: still life/ambient - Key features: steam plume detail; wood grain texture; light rim on cup; warm tones; Scale: medium close-up; Motion: slow upward drift of steam - Location: café or home kitchen; Time: morning; Weather/Light: soft window light - Key elements (FG/MG/BG): FG steam plume / MG cup and handle / BG blurred bokeh window light - Lighting: warm side window light; rim light on cup edge; gentle shadow under cup; steam catch light - Grade: Palette warm wood brown/burnt orange; creamy coffee tones; soft bokeh; subtle vignette - Visual taste: minimalist café aesthetic; meditative atmosphere; focus on simple pleasures - Camera: locked 45-degree angle; gimbal minimal sway; organic steam movement - Lens/Focus: 85mm feel; shallow DOF on cup; steam bokeh background - Coverage: extended morning sequence; maintain consistency; steam evolution

simple_prompt: A comet streaking across a star-filled galaxy.
detailed_prompt: # COSMIC ORBIT - ASTROPHYSICAL DANCE - Subject: A massive, glowing green comet (with visible ion tail) moving rapidly. Action: Slicing through a dense cluster of stars and nebulae. Scene: Deep space, billions of light-years from Earth. Lighting: Primary illumination from the comet's own glow and reflected light from nearby stars/nebulae. Camera: Fixed tripod, ultra-wide-angle lens, extreme time-lapse effect, emphasis on the scale of the universe. Grade: Deep black space, vibrant green comet, sharp stars, zero noise.

simple_prompt: A time-lapse of a flower blooming in a lush garden.
detailed_prompt: Macro time-lapse, 100fps feel. **Subject:** A rosebud. **Scene:** A dewy, green garden at dawn. **Action:** The camera remains static, focused on the bud. Over 8-10 seconds (compressed from 24 hours), the bud swells, cracks open, and unfurls into a full, vibrant red rose, petals unfurling slowly. Dew drops on the petals glisten and eventually fall off. **Lighting:** Soft, diffused morning light. **Mood:** Life, growth, beauty.

simple_prompt: A grandmother teaching her granddaughter how to bake cookies in a warm kitchen
detailed_prompt: # FAMILY TRADITION - DOMESTIC JOY - Subject: Two generations of women (grandmother, granddaughter). Action: Grandma carefully measuring flour while granddaughter stirs batter, both smiling. Scene: Cozy, rustic kitchen with wood table, afternoon light. Lighting: Warm, soft window light from the side, gentle shadows, volumetric dust particles. Camera: Medium shot, fixed tripod, 50mm lens, focus on hands working together, slight slow-motion on mixing action. Grade: Warm, golden tones, soft contrast, nostalgic feel, subtle halation.

simple_prompt: A lone astronaut walking on Mars, red dust kicking up with each step, cinematic
detailed_prompt:
[Scene: An astronaut in white suit walks alone across Mars’ rust-red landscape. Dust clouds rise with boots.]  
Camera: Wide shot from behind, then slow push-in. Lighting: Harsh sun, deep shadows. Color: Iron oxide red. Audio: Crunching footsteps, radio static.

Focus on body extension and catch. - Lighting: Bright natural light. Motion blur on background. - Motion: Dog extends limbs gracefully. Frisbee spins slowly. - Details: Fur detail, tongue lapping. - Atmosphere: Playfulness, athleticism. - Style: Sports photography with slow-motion. Inspired by GoPro sports clips. - Color Grading: Natural greens and browns. Add motion blur. - Sound Design: Slight wind rush and subtle bark.

detailed_prompt: # WINGS OF LIGHT - [Scene: A hummingbird hovers in front of a red trumpet flower, its wings beating so fast they blur. Pollen dust floats in air.] - Camera: Extreme close-up on beak and flower. Use high-speed slow-motion for wing details. - Lighting: Bright sunlight creates iridescent glints on feathers. Tiny claws grasp stem. - Atmosphere: Grace, agility, adaptation. - Style: Nature documentary hyperrealism. Inspired by Planet Earth and Wings. - Color Grading: Vibrant saturation with golden highlights. Add lens flare. - Sound Design: Rapid wing buzz, soft hum, and gentle breeze.

Cut to close-up of squirrel’s face. - Lighting: Midday sun. Warm tones. Reflections on cookie. - Motion: Squirrel scurries. simple_prompt: A pixel-art dungeon crawl with torches illuminating stone walls
detailed_prompt: Style: Isometric tile-based RPG dungeon crawler pixel art. A party of adventurers navigates a dark underground complex using flickering torches for light. Lighting: The primary illumination comes from the characters' torches, creating pools of light that reveal stone walls, mossy floors, and shadowy corners hiding dangers. Stone textures: Rough hewn dungeon walls with occasional carvings or runes. Animated details: Torch flames flicker and sway, water drips slowly from the ceiling, and bats flutter through cave passages. Camera: Follows the party's movement through the dungeon levels, occasionally revealing surprises from around corners or behind doors.

simple_prompt: A whimsical 2D animation of stars dancing in the night sky
detailed_prompt: [0-3s] ACTION:{Stars twirl and sway in choreographed pattern}; CAMERA:{Static wide shot}; SUBJECT:{Various star shapes}; SCENE:{Deep black sky}; LIGHT:{Star self-illumination}; STYLE:{Toon cel}; FX:{Spark trails}; AUDIO:{Bells + chimes}

simple_prompt: 3D animation of colorful geometric shapes morphing and dancing to a rhythm
detailed_prompt: # SHAPE DANCE - MUSICAL ABSTRACTION - Subject: Abstract 3D geometric shapes (spheres, cubes, pyramids) with high-saturation colors. Action: Smooth, fluid morphing and bouncing in time to a rhythmic electronic beat (e.g., EDM). Scene: Minimalist white void space. Lighting: Bright, clean key light from above, strong specular highlights on the colored surfaces. Camera: Dynamic motion cam, follows the lead shape's movement, cuts between close-ups and wide shots in time with the beat. Grade: High-key, vibrant saturation, zero noise/grain, perfect sharpness.

simple_prompt: Stop-motion style clay animation of a small creature exploring a miniature forest
detailed_prompt: [0-3s] ACTION:{Tiny blue clay creature peers out from mushroom hut, waves to tree spirits}; CAMERA:{Low-angle MS}; SUBJECT:{Blue creature with movable eyes, textured fur}; SCENE:{Miniature diorama forest with glowing flowers}; LIGHT:{Soft blue ambient light + warm glow accents}; STYLE:{Stop-motion bounce + squash frames}; FX:{Glow particles drift}; AUDIO:{Tiny footsteps + wind chimes}

simple_prompt: Retro 80s style synthwave drive through a grid landscape with a purple sunset
detailed_prompt: Style: Cinematic neon-drenched retro synthwave aesthetic. A sleek futuristic car glides through a stylized 1980s-inspired cityscape at night. Environment: Clean modern architecture with vibrant neon signage in red, cyan, and magenta. Lighting: Strong directional purple sunset light creates long shadows on the ground. Neon reflections bounce off wet pavement. Camera: Smooth tracking shot from the passenger seat inside the car, capturing the speed blur of buildings and signs. Audio: Retro electronic synthwave soundtrack with driving beats and vintage vocal samples.

simple_prompt: A fish swimming through a coral reef
detailed_prompt: # REEF DANCE - AQUATIC MACRO EXPLOSION - Subject: Clownfish (vibrant orange with white stripes) and sea anemone. Action: Rapid, playful movement through the tentacles of a giant sea anemone, followed by a slow swim-through a tunnel of coral. Scene: Vibrant, sunlit coral reef, clear turquoise water, sand bottom. Lighting: Strong, directional sunlight filtering down from the surface, creating dramatic caustic light patterns on the coral and sand. Camera: Underwater tracking shot, stabilized, slow-motion on the tail flicks, 100mm macro lens feel, focus on the texture of the anemone and the iridescence of the clownfish's scales. Grade: High saturation, vibrant blues and oranges, clean, sharp detail, subtle chromatic aberration for authenticity.

simple_prompt: A futuristic 3D cityscape with flying cars commuting during rush hour
detailed_prompt: Cinematic 3D animation: Neon-drenched megacity at night. Flying vehicles glide through vertical streets. Volumetric fog with light beams. Dynamic camera tracking a specific vehicle. Reflective surfaces on buildings, wet pavement. Audio: synth hums, distant traffic, raindrops. Cool blue/acid green palette with neon accents. Hyperrealistic reflections and motion blur.

simple_prompt: A timelapse of a city park transitioning through four seasons
detailed_prompt: Seasonal transformation from spring to winter. Spring: Flowers bloom, people enjoying sunny day. Summer: Lush greenery, children playing, long daylight. Fall: Leaves changing colors, falling, emptying park. Winter: Snow-covered landscape, solitary figures, frozen lake. Lighting: Changes with season - bright spring sun, summer haze, autumn golden hour, winter diffuse light. Camera: Fixed tripod position overlooking park. Color: Seasonal palette transitions smoothly. Audio: Seasonal soundscapes - spring birds, summer laughter, fall crunching leaves, winter silence.

simple_prompt: A child building a sandcastle on a sunny beach
detailed_prompt: # SUMMER DREAMS - CHILDHOOD IMAGINATION - Subject: A young child (age 6-8, focused, wearing oversized sunscreen). Action: Carefully sculpting a detailed sandcastle complete with towers, moat, and flags. Scene: Warm, golden hour beach, gentle waves, umbrellas in the background. Lighting: Low, warm sun, long shadows, golden highlights on wet sand. Camera: Medium close-up, fixed tripod, focus on hands and the texture of the sand, subtle lens flare from the sun. Grade: Warm, high-key, soft focus, nostalgic feel.
